item.description:
I'll be going to the Cadillac Ranch in Southington tonight with another group. I'm friends with everyone on here so I would have invited all of you anyways so the more the merrier! We're planning to be there for 07:30p.m. I can't line dance to save my life and there are beginner lessons from 8-9p.m. so I'll be doing the lesson with some of you lol! There is a five dollar cover so be aware of that.

 

The ranch is an excellent bar if your into the country scene and even if you aren't it's still fun to go and has a very friendly environment. I'll be wearing my cowboy hat, boots, and belt buckle the whole nine yards so if any of you have any country attire by all means rock it! Looking forward to seeing all of you there. Until then enjoy life to the fullest.

Cheers,

John
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the black cowboy hat but it's easier to text or call me at 860-919-9782
item.name: Cadillac Ranch in Southington Yee Haw!
